VideoOverlay.setMixingLayer

Function/Meaning
Set the mixing target layer
Type
Method of VideoOverlay class
Syntax
setMixingLayer(layer)
Arguments
layer Layer
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Mixes the video with the specified layer.
Mixing is performed with the layer image as it exists when this method is called.
To reflect updates to the layer image, you must call this method again.
By using VideOverlay.OnFrameUpdate to check if the layer image has been updated and then calling this method, updates can be reflected automatically. Calling this method every frame in onFrameUpdate will result in a significant processing load, so it is best to avoid doing so.
Available only in mixer mode.
